df-mid
blocks.content: Define the midpoint operation. Definition 10.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 88. See ~ ismidb , ~ midbtwn , and ~ midcgr . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmid, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ midG =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ∈(Base ` s0), s2 ∈(Base ` s0)↦ iota(s3 ∈(Base ` s0), s2 =(((pInvG ` s0)` s3)` s1))))
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-lmi
blocks.content: Define the line mirroring function. Definition 10.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. See ~ islmib . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lmi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(clmi, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crn(cfv(clng, cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmid, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cperpg, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(clng, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lmi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ lInvG =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ∈ ran((LineG ` s0))↦(s2 ∈(Base ` s0)↦ iota(s3 ∈(Base ` s0),((s2[(midG ` s0)]s3)∈ s1 ∧(s1[(perpG ` s0)](s2[(LineG ` s0)]s3)∨ s2 = s3))))))
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: midf
blocks.content: Midpoint as a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm midf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c0), cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstrkgld, nat2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c0), cxp(c1, c1), c1), wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  sylib(w0, wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), cxp(c1, c1), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1))))
  syl(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1))), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wreu(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, wreu(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))
  mideu(hs2, c1, cv(hs1), cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs0), c0, c2, c3, cfv(clng, c0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  eqid(cfv(clng, c0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(c0, cstrkg))
  eqid(cfv(cmir, c0))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(c0, cstrkgld, nat2))
  2ralimi(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, wreu(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1))
  riotacl(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  feq1d(cfv(cmid, c0), cxp(c1, c1), c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), w0)
  fvmptd3(hs3, cmid, c0, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), universe, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), universe, w0)
  df-mid(hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  mpoeq123dv(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  riotaeqbidv(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c1, wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2), cfv(cmir, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cmir)
  elexd(c0, cstrkg, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), universe))
  mpt2ex(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cmir, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(clng, c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm midf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((midG ` c0):(c1 × c1)→ c1))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(dist ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(Itv ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[TarskiGDim>=]2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ((midG ` c0):(c1 × c1)→ c1), ((hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))):(c1 × c1)→ c1))
  sylib(w0, ((hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))):(c1 × c1)→ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))∈ c1)))
  syl(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))∈ c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∃!(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, ∃!(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))
  mideu(hs2, c1, hs1, (pInvG ` c0), hs0, c0, c2, c3, (LineG ` c0), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)))
  eqid((LineG ` c0))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), c0 ∈ TarskiG)
  eqid((pInvG ` c0))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), c0[TarskiGDim> =]2)
  2ralimi(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, ∃!(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)), iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))∈ c1)
  riotacl(hs2, c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)), c1, (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))))
  feq1d((midG ` c0), (c1 × c1), c1, (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))), w0)
  fvmptd3(hs3, cmid, c0, (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))), universe, (hs0 ∈(Base ` hs3), hs1 ∈(Base ` hs3)↦ iota(hs2 ∈(Base ` hs3), hs1 =(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0))), universe, w0)
  df-mid(hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  mpoeq123dv(hs0, hs1, (Base ` hs3), (Base ` hs3), iota(hs2 ∈(Base ` hs3), hs1 =(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0)), c1, c1, iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)), hs3 = c0)
  riotaeqbidv(hs2, (Base ` hs3), c1, hs3 = c0, hs1 =(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0), hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs3), c1, (Base ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(hs1, (((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0), (((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq1d(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2), hs0, ((pInvG ` c0)` hs2), hs3 = c0)
  fveq1d((pInvG ` hs3), hs2, (pInvG ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cmir)
  elexd(c0, cstrkg, w0)
  a1i(w0, (hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))∈ 𝕌)
  mpt2ex(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c((pInvG ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c((LineG ` c0))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c((hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))))
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs3 = c0)
}

blocks.name: ismidb
blocks.content: Property of the midpoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismidb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0), c2)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmir, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0), c2), wceq(crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c2)), wcel(c2, c5), wreu(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))))
  riota2(hs0, c2, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3)), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)))
  eqeq2d(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3), cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  eqeq1d(co(c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0), c2, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), c5, w0)
  fvmptd3(hs3, cmid, c4, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe, w0)
  df-mid(hs3, hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mpoeq123dv(hs1, hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  riotaeqbidv(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c5, wceq(cv(hs3), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c5, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c4, cbs)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq1d(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq1d(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), c1, wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), c1, cfv(cmir, c4), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c4, cmir)
  elexd(c4, cstrkg, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpo(hs1, hs2, c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe))
  mpt2ex(hs1, hs2, c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  fvexi(c5, cbs, c4)
  riotabidv(hs0, c5, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  fveq2d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), c3, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  syl(w0, wcel(crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c5), wreu(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))))

thm midbtwn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))

} = {
  tgbtwncom(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), c0, c3, c2, c4, c1, c5, w0)
  eleqtrrd(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), co(c2, c3, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)), c0), c3, c0), w0)

  eqid(cfv(clng, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cfv(cmir, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)))
  oveq1d(c2, c3, c0, cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)), c0), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)), c0)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)))
  eqidd(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), w0)
  ismidb(c2, cfv(cmir, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), c0, c1, c4, c5, c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cmir, c1))

thm mirmid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)[(midG ` c2)](c0 ` c3))=(c0 `(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c5 =(dist ` c2)
  ⊣ c6 =(Itv ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[TarskiGDim>=]2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c0 =((pInvG ` c2)` c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c4)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, ((c0 ` c1)[(midG ` c2)](c0 ` c3))=(c0 `(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3)), (c0 ` c3)=(((pInvG ` c2)`(c0 `(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3)))`(c0 ` c1)))
  eqtrd((c0 ` c3), (((pInvG ` c2)`(c0 `(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3)))`(c0 ` c1)), (c0 `(((pInvG ` c2)`(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3))` c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, c3, (((pInvG ` c2)`(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3))` c1), w0)
  mpbird(w0, c3 =(((pInvG ` c2)`(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3))` c1), (c1[(midG ` c2)]c3)=(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3))
  eqidd((c1[(midG ` c2)]c3), w0)
  ismidb(c3, (pInvG ` c2), (c1[(midG ` c2)]c3), c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  mirmir2(c0, (pInvG ` c2), (c1[(midG ` c2)]c3), c1, c4, c2, c5, c6, (LineG ` c2), c7, w0)
  ismidb((c0 ` c3), (pInvG ` c2), (c0 `(c1[(midG ` c2)]c3)), (c0 ` c1), c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  mircl(c0, c1, c4, c2, c5, c6, (LineG ` c2), (pInvG ` c2), c7, w0)
  mircl(c0, c3, c4, c2, c5, c6, (LineG ` c2), (pInvG ` c2), c7, w0)
  mircl(c0, (c1[(midG ` c2)]c3), c4, c2, c5, c6, (LineG ` c2), (pInvG ` c2), c7, w0)
  eqid((LineG ` c2))
  eqid((pInvG ` c2))
  midcl(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}

blocks.name: lmieu
blocks.content: Uniqueness of the line mirror point. Theorem 10.2 of [Schwabhauser] p. 88. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)

  mpteq12dv(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmid, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), wo(wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cperpg, cv(hs3)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(clng, cv(hs3)), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), c1, crio(hs1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmid, c2), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), wo(wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cperpg, c2), co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wceq(cv(hs3), c2))

  fvmptd3(hs3, clmi, c2, (hs2 ∈ ran(c6)↦(hs0 ∈ c1 ↦ iota(hs1 ∈ c1,((hs0[(midG ` c2)]hs1)∈ hs2 ∧(hs2[(perpG ` c2)](hs0[c6]hs1)∨ hs0 = hs1))))), universe, (hs2 ∈ ran((LineG ` hs3))↦(hs0 ∈(Base ` hs3)↦ iota(hs1 ∈(Base ` hs3),((hs0[(midG ` hs3)]hs1)∈ hs2 ∧(hs2[(perpG ` hs3)](hs0[(LineG ` hs3)]hs1)∨ hs0 = hs1))))), universe, w0)

  riotabidv(hs1, c1, hs2 = c5, ((hs0[(midG ` c2)]hs1)∈ hs2 ∧(hs2[(perpG ` c2)](hs0[c6]hs1)∨ hs0 = hs1)), ((hs0[(midG ` c2)]hs1)∈ c5 ∧(c5[(perpG ` c2)](hs0[c6]hs1)∨ hs0 = hs1)))

thm lmicl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, c2, c2, w0)
  lmif(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}

thm islmib(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

thm islmib(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c7 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c8 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[TarskiGDim>=]2)
  ⊣ c1 =((lInvG ` c3)` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ran(c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, c0 =(c1 ` c2), ((c2[(midG ` c3)]c0)∈ c4 ∧(c4[(perpG ` c3)](c2[c5]c0)∨ c2 = c0)), c0 = iota(hs0 ∈ c6,((c2[(midG ` c3)]hs0)∈ c4 ∧(c4[(perpG ` c3)](c2[c5]hs0)∨ c2 = hs0))))
  eqeq2d(c0, (c1 ` c2), iota(hs0 ∈ c6,((c2[(midG ` c3)]hs0)∈ c4 ∧(c4[(perpG ` c3)](c2[c5]hs0)∨ c2 = hs0))), w0)
  fvmptd(hs1, c1, c2, iota(hs0 ∈ c6,((c2[(midG ` c3)]hs0)∈ c4 ∧(c4[(perpG ` c3)](c2[c5]hs0)∨ c2 = hs0))), c6, iota(hs0 ∈ c6,((hs1[(midG ` c3)]hs0)∈ c4 ∧(c4[(perpG ` c3)](hs1[c5]hs0)∨ hs1 = hs0))), c6, w0)

blocks.content: The line mirroring function is an involution. Theorem 10.4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm lmicom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c4), c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clng, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c2), c7), wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c2), c7, co(c2, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), w0)
  midcom(c2, c4, c1, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(co(c2, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), c7), wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1)), wceq(c2, c1)))
  sylib(w0, wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)), wceq(c2, c1)))
  orcomd(w0, wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)), wceq(c2, c1))
  orrd(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)))
  mpbid(w0, wi(wn(wceq(c2, c1)), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2))), wi(wn(wceq(c2, c1)), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1))))
  ord(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1)))
  orcomd(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1)))
  simprd(w0, wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1)), wceq(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), c7))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(co(c2, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), c7), wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1)), wceq(c2, c1))), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, c2)))
  eqcomd(c1, cfv(c0, c2), w0)
  islmib(c1, c0, c2, c4, c7, c8, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  pm5.74da(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1)), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1)), wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)))
  breq2d(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c2, c8, c1), co(c1, c8, c2), wa(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1))))
  tglinecom(c2, c8, c1, c3, c4, c6, wa(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1)), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c3))
  neqned(c2, c1, wa(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1))))
  simpr(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c1)))
  orbi2i(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)), wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c1, c2))
  eqcom(c2, c1)
  islmib(c2, c0, c1, c4, c7, c8, c3, c5, c6, w0)

thm lmicom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(dist ` c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(Itv ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4[TarskiGDim>=]2)
  ⊣ c0 =((lInvG ` c4)` c7)
  ⊣ c8 =(LineG ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ ran(c8))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ` c2)= c1)
} = {
  eqcomd((c0 ` c1), c2, w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, c2 =(c0 ` c1), (c1[(midG ` c4)]c2)∈ c7, (c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2)∨ c1 = c2))
  eqeltrrd((c1[(midG ` c4)]c2), c7, (c2[(midG ` c4)]c1), w0)
  midcom(c2, c4, c1, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  simpld(w0, (c2[(midG ` c4)]c1)∈ c7, (c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1)∨ c2 = c1))
  sylib(w0, (c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2)∨ c1 = c2), (c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2)∨ c2 = c1))
  orcomd(w0, c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2), c2 = c1)
  orrd(w0, c2 = c1, c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2))
  mpbid(w0, (¬ c2 = c1 → c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2)), (¬ c2 = c1 → c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1)))
  ord(w0, c2 = c1, c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1))
  orcomd(w0, c2 = c1, c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1))
  simprd(w0, (c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1)∨ c2 = c1), (c2[(midG ` c4)]c1)∈ c7)
  mpbid(w0, ((c2[(midG ` c4)]c1)∈ c7 ∧(c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1)∨ c2 = c1)), c1 =(c0 ` c2))
  eqcomd(c1, (c0 ` c2), w0)
  islmib(c1, c0, c2, c4, c7, c8, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  pm5.74da(w0, ¬ c2 = c1, c7[(perpG ` c4)](c2[c8]c1), c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2))
  breq2d(c7, (perpG ` c4), (c2[c8]c1), (c1[c8]c2), (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 = c1))
  tglinecom(c2, c8, c1, c3, c4, c6, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 = c1))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 = c1, c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 = c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 = c1, c1 ∈ c3)
  neqned(c2, c1, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 = c1))
  simpr(w0, ¬ c2 = c1)
  orbi2i(c7[(perpG ` c4)](c1[c8]c2), c2 = c1, c1 = c2)
  eqcom(c2, c1)
  islmib(c2, c0, c1, c4, c7, c8, c3, c5, c6, w0)
}

thm lmilmi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  lmicom(c0, cfv(c0, c1), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  lmicl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)

}

blocks.name: lmireu
blocks.content: Any point has a unique antecedent through line mirroring. Theorem 10.6 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmireu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))

  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))), diffsc(s0, c7))
  syl3anc(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c1, c2)), c2), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1, c2)))))
  lmicl(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  lmilmi(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1, c2))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1, c2)))
  eqtr3d(cv(s0), cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  lmilmi(c1, cv(s0), c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(c6, crn(c7)))

  fveq2d(c1, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  eqreu(s0, cfv(c1, c2), c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c1, c2)), c2), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  fveqeq2(cv(s0), cfv(c1, c2), c1, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c1, cfv(c1, c2)), c2)

  ⊢ (w0 → ∃!(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s0)= c2))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)

  ⊣ c7 =(LineG ` c3)

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

} = {

  lmicl(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  lmilmi(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, ((c1 ` s0)= c2 → s0 =(c1 ` c2)))
  ex((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c1 ` s0)= c2, s0 =(c1 ` c2))
  eqtr3d(s0, (c1 ` c2), (c1 `(c1 ` s0)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧(c1 ` s0)= c2))
  lmilmi(c1, s0, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧(c1 ` s0)= c2))

thm lmieq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  reu2eqd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0, wceq(cfv(c6, cv(hs0)), cfv(c6, c1)), wceq(cfv(c6, c0), cfv(c6, c1)), wceq(cfv(c6, c1), cfv(c6, c1)))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, c6, cfv(c6, c1))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c1, c6, cfv(c6, c1))
  lmireu(hs0, c2, c6, cfv(c6, c1), c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  lmicl(c6, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c6, c0), cfv(c6, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c6, c1), cfv(c6, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c6, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)

blocks.name: lmiinv
blocks.content: The invariants of the line mirroring lie on the mirror line. Theorem 10.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmiinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

} = {
  3bitr3d(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), c2), wo(wbr(c2, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c7, c1)), wceq(c1, c1))))

  biantrud(w0, wcel(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), c2), wo(wbr(c2, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c7, c1)), wceq(c1, c1)))
  olcd(w0, wbr(c2, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c7, c1)), wceq(c1, c1))

  eleq1d(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), c2, c1, w0)

  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)= c1 ↔ c1 ∈ c2))

  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), cfv(c2, c1)), c10), wceq(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c4), c10), c1)))

blocks.name: lmiiso
blocks.content: The line mirroring function is an isometry, i.e. it is conserves congruence. Because it is also a bijection, it is also a motion. Theorem 10.10 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmiiso(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(c0, c3)), co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c5), c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clng, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  lmiisolem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, cfv(cfv(cmir, c5), co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3)))), co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3))), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cfv(cmir, c5), co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3)))))
  eqid(co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3))))
}

  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)[c2](c0 ` c3))=(c1[c2]c3))

  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
} = {

  eqid(((pInvG ` c5)`((c1[(midG ` c5)](c0 ` c1))[(midG ` c5)](c3[(midG ` c5)](c0 ` c3)))))
  eqid(((c1[(midG ` c5)](c0 ` c1))[(midG ` c5)](c3[(midG ` c5)](c0 ` c3))))

blocks.name: trgcopy
blocks.content: Triangle construction: a copy of a given triangle can always be constructed in such a way that one side is lying on a half-line, and the third vertex is on a given half-plane: existence part. First part of Theorem 10.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 92. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: trgcopyeu
blocks.content: Triangle construction: a copy of a given triangle can always be constructed in such a way that one side is lying on a half-line, and the third vertex is on a given half-plane: uniqueness part. Second part of Theorem 10.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 92. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Aug-2020.)
